title: Larethian's Wrath
content:
iciency with this weapon type unlocks:

Deceptively light, the blade rasps through castle-forged plate as easily as Corellon Larethian's own anarchic holy sword through the hearts of evil ores.

Longsword Versatile

Larethian's Wrath is one of the Longsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Larethian's Wrath is a magic sword that allows the user to deal damage in aoe around him spending an action. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippab
